meanings.definition: A plant of the figwort family with tubular flowers.
meanings.sent1: The pentstemon in the garden has beautiful tubular flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a pentstemon in my backyard for its unique tubular blooms.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the pentstemon, enjoying its tubular flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a colorful canvas, with the pentstemon standing tall like a tubular beacon.
meanings.sent5: The pentstemon's tubular flowers swayed gently in the breeze, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Pentstemon.
meanings.sent1: The pentstemon in the park adds a pop of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent2: I love how the pentstemon brightens up the garden with its vibrant hues.
meanings.sent3: The pentstemon seemed to be gossiping with the other plants in the genus Pentstemon.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of green, the pentstemon stood out like a proud member of its genus.
meanings.sent5: As I walked by, the pentstemon waved hello, a friendly plant indeed.
